Description: Papyrus (nine fragments). Demotic narrative text on recto; verso blank. The fragments are torn on both sides and top and bottom. Fragment B has a right-hand margin. Fragments A, B and C contain parts of six, seven and six lines respectively. Fragment D has just a few signs from four lines; fragments E and F isolated signs; fragment G just traces; fragment H one word and fragment I just a trace.
Curator's comments: The fragments contain phrases which are attested in demotic narrative texts (e.g. 'Pharaoh opened his mouth with a [great] cry; fragment A, line x+5)..
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (380966) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/380966)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: deposit, discoloured, displaced fragments, fractured Black ink (palimpsest) Tabbed: kraft paper Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Binding: kraft paper Object Priority: B Mount Priority: B Overall Condition: B Curatorial condition comment: incomplete/fragmentary
